title: Sri Lanka Central Highlands Boutique Retreat Overlooking Castlereagh Reservoir with Butler Service
description: Treat yourself to serene seclusion in the verdant highlands of Sri Lanka at Camellia Hills. This exclusive retreat offers breathtaking panoramic views of the surrounding tea estates and the tranquil Castlereagh Reservoir. Spend your days exploring the picturesque surrounding trails, visiting nearby tea factories or indulging in local cuisine at the hotel's gourmet restaurant.
offer_address: Camellia Hills, Dunkeld Estate, Dickoya 22000, Sri Lanka
